name: Tarnation
tagline: Filmmaker Jonathan Caouette's documentary on growing up with his schizophrenic mother -- a mixture of snapshots, Super-8, answering machine messages, video diaries, early short films, and more -- culled from 19 years of his life.

name: Night of the Creeps
tagline: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

name: Below
tagline: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

name: Powaqqatsi

production.name: Santa Fe Institute for Regional Education

tagline: An exploration of technologically developing nations and the effect the transition to Western-style modernization has had on them.

name: To the Wonder
tagline: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.

name: Shaadi Ke Side Effects
tagline: A complicated relationship develops between a man and woman after getting married and having a baby.

name: The Pope Must Diet
tagline: A less-than-qualified and far-from-perfect priest is mistakenly named the new pope. As the pontiff, he must deal with Vatican corruption, the Mob and the reappearance of his old lover.

name: W.E.
tagline: The affair between King Edward VIII and American divorcée Wallis Simpson, and a contemporary romance between a married woman and a Russian security guard.

name: Orgazmo
tagline: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

name: The Opportunists
tagline: A struggling auto mechanic with a criminal past agrees to one last heist to pay off his debts.

name: All Good Things
tagline: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

name: Tibet: Cry of the Snow Lion
tagline: A film about the state of Chinese occupied Tibet and its history of oppression and resistance.

name: Mumbai Diaries
tagline: The lives of four people intersect in Mumbai: a washer-man who wants to become an actor, a banker-turned-photographer, a painter looking for inspiration, and a newly-married immigrant who journals her experiences on home video.

name: Salinger
tagline: An unprecedented look inside the private world of J.D. Salinger, the reclusive author of The Catcher in the Rye.

name: Johnny Stecchino
tagline: A kindhearted but bumbling idiot who likes to steal bananas, is passed off for a snitch hiding from the mob.

name: Household Saints
tagline: Unsettling drama about three generations of Italian-American women struggling to get by in post-World War II New York's Little Italy.

name: Bar Girls
tagline: The life and loves of gay women hanging out at a local tavern are examined in this slice of life film.

name: Wild Orchid II: Two Shades of Blue
The Emperor's New Clothes
tagline: During Napoleon's exile on St. Helena, some loyalists hire a look-alike to swap places with the deposed emperor: while the impostor lives in luxury on the island, the real Napoleon returns to Paris in order to retake the throne.

name: Down in the Valley
tagline: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

name: The Future
tagline: When a couple decides to adopt a stray cat their perspective on life changes radically, literally altering the course of time and space and testing their faith in each other and themselves.

name: Lemon Tree
tagline: The story of a Palestinian widow who must defend her lemontree field when a new Israeli Defense Minister moves next to her and threatens to have her lemon grove torn down.

name: Touch of Pink
tagline: A gay Canadian living in London has his perfectly crafted life upset when his devoutly Muslim mother comes to visit.

name: Dum Maaro Dum
tagline: A corrupt police officer is entrusted the task of apprehending drug-dealers.

name: The Fluffer
tagline: A young man employed as a fluffer in the adult entertainment industry finds himself falling for a gay-for-pay porn star whose hedonistic lifestyle may lead them both to destruction.

name: Steel Dawn
tagline: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.

name: Poolhall Junkies
tagline: A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years, must go back to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy, the very man who held him back from greatness.

name: Undefeated
tagline: A documentary on an underdog football team who look to reverse their fortunes with coach Bill Courtney.

name: Rich Girl
tagline: A rich Beverly Hills girl gets a job as a waitress, and falls in love with a rock singer.

name: The Weather Underground
tagline: The remarkable story of The Weather Underground, radical activists of the 1970s, and of radical politics at its best and most disastrous.

name: Tamara Drewe
tagline: A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.

name: Taxi 2
tagline: Police inspector Emilien and his taxi-driver pal Daniel are back, this time on the tail of a group of Japanese yakuza.

name: Even the Rain
tagline: As a director and his crew shoot a controversial film about Christopher Columbus in Cochabamba, Bolivia, local people rise up against plans to privatize the water supply.

name: Palindromes
tagline: Aviva is thirteen, awkward and sensitive. Her mother Joyce is warm and loving, as is her father, Steve, a regular guy who does have a fierce temper from time to time. The film revolves around her family, friends and neighbors.

name: American Violet
tagline: A single mother struggles to clear her name after being wrongly accused and arrested for dealing drugs in an impoverished town in Texas.

name: The Italian

production.name: Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation

tagline: Set in 2002, an abandoned 5-year-old boy living in a rundown orphanage in a small Russian village is adopted by an Italian family.

name: Mesrine: Killer Instinct
tagline: The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy N°1.

name: Twelfth Night or What You Will
tagline: Shakespeare's comedy of gender confusion, in which a girl disguises herself as a man to be near the count she adores, only to be pursued by the woman he loves.

name: The Lost Medallion: The Adventures of Billy Stone
tagline: A man who stops into a foster home to drop off some donations soon tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.

name: The Maid
tagline: A drama centered on a maid trying to hold on to her position after having served a family for 23 years.

name: Ondine
tagline: The story of an Irish fisherman who discovers a woman in his fishing net who he believes to be a Selke (a water nymph).

name: Reprise
tagline: Two competitive friends, fueled by literary aspirations and youthful exuberance, endure the pangs of love, depression and burgeoning careers.

name: From Mexico with Love
tagline: A washed-up trainer takes a self-destructive young boxer under his wing.

name: All the Real Girls
tagline: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

name: Amazon Women on the Moon
tagline: A spoof 1950's sci-fi movie, interspersed with various comedy sketches.

name: The Final Cut
tagline: Set in a world with memory implants, Robin Williams plays a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

name: Mother
tagline: A mother desperately searches for the killer that framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

name: A Map of the World
tagline: A woman's life falls apart after she's blamed for an accident on her property.

name: Jet Lag
tagline: A worn-out businessman and a beautician on the run collide in a Paris airport. Love arrives, all its hurdles be damned.

name: Double Dhamaal
tagline: Four slackers decide to avenge their humiliation at the hands of a con-man.

name: Khatta Meetha
tagline: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.

name: Facing Windows
tagline: Overburdened and stuck in a greying marriage, Giovanna takes to caring for the Jewish Holocaust survivor her husband brings home. As she begins to reflect on her life, she turns to the man who lives across from her ...

name: Strike It Rich
tagline: A London accountant on his honeymoon gets swept away by gambling fever.

name: The Art of the Steal
tagline: Documentary that follows the struggle for control of Dr. Albert C. Barnes' 25 billion dollar collection of modern and post-impressionist art.

name: Changing Times
tagline: Traveling from France to Tangiers, a man looks to reunite with his former love, though their romance ended some 30 years earlier.

name: American Buffalo
tagline: Long-repressed feelings of bitterness and betrayal explode when three inner-city losers plot the robbery of a valuable coin in a seedy second-hand junk shop.

name: Romance & Cigarettes
tagline: A down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York, tells a story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

name: The Assignment
tagline: An American naval officer is recruited for an operation to eliminate his lookalike, the infamous terrorist Carlos The Jackal.

name: Eddie and the Cruisers II: Eddie Lives!
tagline: A Montreal construction worker joins a band and turns out to be a long-lost rock star from 1960s New Jersey - none other than Eddie Wilson, who mysteriously disappeared after a road accident.

name: Peace, Love, & Misunderstanding
tagline: An uptight NYC lawyer takes her two teenagers to her hippie mother's farmhouse upstate for a family vacation.

name: Jack Goes Boating
tagline: A limo driver's blind date sparks a tale of love, betrayal, friendship, and grace centered around two working-class New York City couples.

name: The Search for Signs of Inteligent Life in the Universe
20 Dates
tagline: A documentary type film about the dates Myles has gone on as he tries to find out how to find love in the future.

name: The Underneath
tagline: A recovering gambling addict attempts to reconcile with his family and friends but finds trouble and temptation when caught between feelings for his ex-wife and her dangerous hoodlum boyfriend.
